::DrillBit::

He is struck in the knee, and stumbles away. After getting some
distance, he once again, opens fire with his gattaling gun. He follows
up with an optic blasts.

::Dollon::

He is struck in the face, and his optic sensors give out. 
"Hey, I cant see!" 
He trips and falls.
